scripts.build: npm run build-selva && npm run build zig && tsc
scripts.playground: npm run build && LOCPATH=./build/locale lldb -b -o run --one-line-on-crash bt -o "script import os; os._exit(0)" node ./dist/test/shared/playground.js
scripts.test: npm run build && LOCPATH=./build/locale lldb -b -o run --one-line-on-crash bt -o "script import os; os._exit(0)" node ./scripts/test.js
scripts.test-gdb: npm run build && LOCPATH=./build/locale gdb -ex run --args node ./scripts/test.js
scripts.test-zig: npm run build-zig && npm run test-fast
scripts.perf: npm run build && node benchmarks/references.js && node benchmarks/transfermarkt/transfermarkt-based.js
